Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory209.png'}
{1: 'Monday, heavy rain', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory209.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Was served a piece of good news and bad news today, and I'm not really sure how I'm supposed to feel.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory209.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'The good news is that it was a peaceful day without any attacks from the Corrupted.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory209.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "And the bad news is that I have to be out there in the pouring rain to stand sentry because I've lost a bet.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory209.png', 6: '1'}

{1: "Just because I'm a Construct doesn't mean I don't grow rusty... Uhm, let me scrap that. Don't think that's something I want anyone to hear.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory209.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Been a few weeks since I came to this place in the middle of nowhere and have seen nothing much other than a few seagulls fly by.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory209.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Word has it that they had a battle here with an Ascendant, which is why a few elite squads have been sent here to station the place.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory209.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Haven't even seen a single Corrupted so far, let alone an Ascendant.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory209.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'All the enemies just went poof like that. Guess we should thank the Goddess of Sea and count our blessings since the place is named Atlantis?', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory209.png', 6: '1'}
{1: "Arghh... To hell with the rain! I'm out!", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory209.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory398.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Irritated, the nicely equipped Construct turns off the voice recorder hanging by his collar.'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: "This is one hell of a rain. Shouldn't have made that bet!", 4: '1'}
{3: "He wipes the water stains off his eyes. Constructs can't possibly catch a cold, but it still bothers them when they get rained on."}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: 'Totally jealous of those guys working in there. Should have worked a little harder at school...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'His walk down memory lane is cut short by a figure flashing past the corner of his eye.'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: 'Stop right there!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Being the well-trained soldier he is, he trains his gun right at the handsome figure.'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: 'Hands behind your head and squat down slowly.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Says the soldier as he approaches the young man step by step.'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: 'Hurry up already!', 4: '1'}
{3: "It isn't until the soldier has come very close to the figure that he finally sees his face clearly."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier', 3: 'R-Ryan... What are you doing here?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ryan', 3: 'Came out for some fresh air.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: 'Fresh air...?', 4: '1'}
{3: "The soldier's voice goes up an octave as he casts a dubious look at the downpour."}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: "My apologies, but I'll have to verify your identity here and would greatly appreciate your cooperation.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Seeing the young man nod, the soldier produces a biosignal detector. A few seconds later, the green light goes on.'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: "You may help yourself to some fresh air now. Mind you, though, it's raining cats and dogs out there.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ryan', 3: "That's fine.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: "(What's up with this place and all the oddballs they've got here...)", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The soldier steps aside to let the handsome researcher pass.'}
{3: "And it's when the soldier sees the coffee mug that the young man holds carefully in his hand."}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: "(God only knows what's going through that head of his...)", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Right when the man turns around ready to head back to his post...'}
{3: 'SPLASH!'}
{3: '...He hears the sound of something falling in water amidst the rain outside.'}
